titleStmt.title: To the Honourable Assembly of Commons, in this present Parliament The humble petition of divers of the Knights, gentlemen, clergy and other inhabitants of the countie of Sommerset.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Lownes, and are to be sold at his shop without Lud-gate,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: The '2' in the inprint date has been altered to a '1'.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
